title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.4 - Knowledge of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.4 - Knowledge of rules

State Regulations

Licensed harness racing corporations or associations
conducting harness racing with pari-mutuel wagering are required, with their
officers and employees, to be responsible for the conduct of their meetings and
to make certain that all officers and executive employees are thoroughly
familiar with provisions of the Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
and the rules and regulations of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4101.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
